goal.ch:
1.增進對哲學家德勒茲思想的理解
2.增進對當代法國哲學的認識
3.增進西方哲學史發展的理解
goal.en:
1.To increase students’ appreciation of philosopher Gilles Deleuze’s thought.
2.To advance students’ understanding of contemporary French philosophy.
3.To improve students’ comprehension of the history of Continental European philosophy.

outline.ch:
法國當代哲學家德勒茲在其一生的哲學事業中，早期的工作在於對哲學史上的諸哲學家之思想，進行解讀並且做出創造性的解釋。
在這學期中，我們將閱讀他對於英國哲學家休謨思想的分析，由此了解後者哲學中的差異、運動、時間以及關係等概念。但更重要的還在於理解德勒茲為自己的思想下的定義：先驗的經驗主義者。

outline.en:
In his lifetime philosophical career, the contemporary French philosopher Deleuze‘s early work was to interpret and create creative explanations of the thoughts of philosophers in the history of philosophy.
In this semester, we will read Deleuze’s analysis of the thought of the British philosopher Hume in order to understand the concepts of difference, motion, time, and relationships in the latter‘s philosophy. But even more important is to understand Deleuze‘s definition of his own thought: a transcendental empiricist.
